name: Rollcage
description:
- Get the installation files at https://www.myabandonware.com/game/rollcage-9zl (or wherever else)
- Mount the it with cdemu
- Run this installer
- Select the 'Full' installation option when prompted by the installer.
content:
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Psygnosis/Rollcage/RollCage.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- insert-disc:
    requires: SETUP.EXE
- task:
    arch: win32
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- execute:
    command: rm -f "$GAMEDIR/dosdevices/d:"
- copy:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/dosdevices/d:/
    src: $DISC/
- task:
    executable: $GAMEDIR/dosdevices/d:/SETUP.EXE
    name: wineexec
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
wine:
  Desktop: true
